item.description:
It is that time of year...Lets all get together and celebrate a Pre Holiday Christmas Dance with the awesome band "Run for Cover"!

YES I was able to get them to play for another great event!

Our last Event with this Band was a Great Time and big turnout!

Lets all get "Festive" wear christmas colors, outfits, hats, antlers, or what ever you feel like wearing to celebrate the upcoming Holiday!

 

This Band plays for many charities to help and support Breast Cancer Awareness..

So lets all get together to celebrate a holiday party together and make it a memorable night!! The Band plays a great variety of music...

 

Band starts at 9PM

The Nan King has a nice large Dance Floor Great Food and Plenty of Parking!

There is NO cover charge!

I will be there for 7:30 to get tables together and dinner! If anyone is interested you can meet me at this time for something to eat or at your own Leisure for apps/drinks...

Put your Dancing shoes on and bring your smiling faces and wonderful attitude and Lets Party!!

Looking Forward to seeing all of you to celebrate and support this great band!

Happy Holidays!!! Camera is Ready :-)

If you need to reach me feel free to message me ......
item.how_to_find_us: We will have meet up signs on tables
item.name: Holiday Christmas dance with "Run For Cover" with no cover (charge) ;-)
